column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I had the chicken which granted
column2: is standard fare but done very well. It was moist and tender
column3: flavorful with the perfect hint of garlic and other herbs. The mashed potatoes were some of the best I've ever had
column4: which surprised me because they don't boast the addition of sour cream
column5: just lots and lots of garlic and butter
column6: and then lots and lots of butter!  If you're concerned about clogged arteries
column7: bring a defibrillator and buck-up.  It's worth the jump start your guest or waiter will have to give you.
